column1: The Purple Pig////This place serves tapas and knew I HAD to order the pork shoulder
column2: and the roasted beets with whipped goat cheese and pistachio butter. I also got a prosciutto for the table and ordered a Colombian old fashioned. Three plates was more than enough for dinner for two
column3: as the portions were impressively large. The pork shoulder was a bit too salty
column4: but very filling and tender. The BEETS were amazing! Everything else I could have done without.
